featured.text: He quit photography right after the publication of The Decisive Moment.
In 1952, his first book, The Decisive Moment, a rich collection of his work spanning two decades, was published.
“There is nothing in this world that does not have a decisive moment,” he said.
He never waited for a decisive moment to shoot photos.
Those who take pride in being decisive often try their best to consider all the factors beforehand.

definition.en_def: Having the power or quality of deciding; conclusive.
definition.example: Her decisive action saved the team from losing the game.
